message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth $150 to me. Considering its value, I believe it would be fair to offer it to you for $120. This price reflects its high quality and the benefits it provides. I hope you find this offer attractive.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at the moment.  I'm willing to pay $105 for it.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I am willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $112.50. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget. I hope this revised offer is more acceptable to you.
Alice, thanks again for your offer.  I'm getting closer, but $112.50 is still a bit out of my price range. I'd be willing to pay $108.50 for the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. To further accommodate your needs, I am willing to offer the product for $110. This price reflects the value of the product while being more flexible with your budget. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
Alice, I'm getting closer to your price point.  I'm willing to offer $109 for the product.  I'm sure we can find a solution that benefits both of us.
